me athara hamuda bhata piris puthukudiirippu saha wellamulliwayikkal yana pradeshawala sidukala sodisi meheyumwalin mimi 27 gini awiyak, pitatha sawi karana bottu enjin 20k saha ema kotas 12k, diyehi gaman kala haki skutarayak, kugar wargaye paniwida huwamaru yanthra katitala 05k ha mayikrafona 05k, athe gena ya haki paniwida huwamaru yanthra katitala 07k, motarola wargaye sanniwedana upakarana katitalayak ha mayikrafonayak, motarola batari charjarayak, 4700 wargaye athe gena ya haki mayikrafona 02k, ti-56 gini awi 38k ha magasinayak, , ti-56 unda 30k, aarpiji bombayak, aarpiji charjas 02k saha his wasumak soya ganimata samath wuha.

es.bi.disanayakage wachana walin kiyanawa nam aanduwe abhilashaya lankawe wishwa widyala jathyantharaya samaga tharaga kala haki mattamakata gena eemaya.sarasawiyata therena sisun hamuda barakka thula gal kota puhunu wadasatahan kerenne jathyantharaye kawara rate kawara pranthayedayi disanayaka pahadili kara natha.mema puhunuwa sambandhawa demawpiyangen ha shishya shishyawangen wiwidha masiwili nagemin thibe.pasugiyada rupawahini sanwadayakata sambandha wu kaluthara disthrik manthri ajith perera mema puhunuwata sahabhagi wima prathikshepa karamin siya aasanaye ekthara muslim shishyawak siya diwi nasaganimata thath kala puwathak helidarawu kaleya.shishyayange kamaththata patahaniwa owunge adhyapanayata mulumanin bahira mewani puhunuwakata sahabhagi wimata bala kirimen rajaya pahadiliwa sisunge mulika ayithiwasikam ullanghanaya kota thibe.awasanawakata mema wadasatahana kalthabimata hakidayi “salaka balana lesa” siduwu mrudu danumdimak misa adhikaranaya me pilibada methek gath kisidu kriyamargayak natha.
